violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: Iceberg D-36B Has Calved from Iceberg D-36A
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.04 (foreground color: #17a2b8, background color: #ffffff, font size: 15.0pt (20px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
